name: The Summer House: The Classic Blockbuster from the Author of Lion & Lamb

title: very in-depth book
content: A riveting story of corruption and evil. Amazing how the story goes from Georgia to Afghanistan. And then back to Georgia, without it making the story confusing. Excellent characters and really well written thriller.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Strong  beginning which made me want to know more about the characters and who perpetrated the horrible murders and why.  But the last quarter of the book got unnecessarily complicated, moving in several directions, too many different side plots. And the ending was too pat; the good guys have happy endings and the bad guys get their comeuppance.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024

title: weak ending
content: Another great book by James Patterson. There are many twists and turns. Could not put it down. Another book to add to your must reads!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: It started out a little slow with a lot of characters to keep track of.  Once you get to the middle it keeps you in suspense till the end…..
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2024

title: Page turner!
content: I needed something to distract me from a head full of preoccupation. After setting aside popular historical, sci-fi, and mystery novels, I picked up this excellent read about miscarriages of justice in DC, Afghanistan, and Georgia, USA. Couldn't put it down. For a day I thought about nothing but the characters and the lengths they went to to find the truth. Very edge-of-the-seat with plenty of twists and turns. Satisfying.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Not your every day summer reading!  No rom-com!  No Hallmark ending!  You will be on the

title: Summer house

post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Well, I don’t really have a gift of gab, BUT, this book is terrifically exciting. It’s probably more for men with a story about the Army and their dealing with civilians in a small southern town. Very different plot and absolutely riveting with characters you feel as though you know/understand, but actually don’t feel you know how it ends. It would be such a good movie……plot so much better than most. My husband is now reading a very different book by author, James Patterson, that I will read and he will read Summer House. Keep writing Patterson.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024

title: Great Book
content: I was so engrossed in the story the hours flew by (pun intended).  Certainly violent with evil government characters that we hope don’t have any doppelgängers in real life.  But it was a good read and so enjoyed it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

title: Verified Purchase
content: I love Jane Patterns books. His writing abilities to keep you reading is amazing, I always try to figure out who did it and why by the middle of the book, but with this book " The Summer house" the climax was increasingly surprising. At every turn if the page it was more intense. I would have given 10 stars if it was possible. I recommend this book as I believe you will love it as much as I did
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2024

title: Amazing
content: This story hits the ground running and doesn't stop. Major Cook's CID team is called in to investigate the massacre of seven civilians allegedly by four Army Rangers. But the pieces fit together a little too well. Why won't the Rangers defend themselves? Why is the local sheriff so unforthcoming and hostile, even when the CID team is treading lightly on her turf? Why are some key Army personnel blocking their access to important information?
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I don't usually like war stories or cop and bad guys stories but this book just pulled me right in. I could not put it down. God Bless our brave soldiers for all they do and have done and to law enforcement for the same. There is always good fighting against evil in our world. Hope and pray that the good wins. Thank you for such a riveting story.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2024

title: Patterson Did It Again! Page Turner!
content: James Patterson has always been one of my favorite authors. He never cease to amaze me. I read this in one day because I couldn't put it down once I started reading. The story was on point. The characters and story was riveting and you just keep turning the pages to what going to happen next. Thank you.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Most of the time, our soldiers don't get the respect they deserve. They suffer and bleed in far away places , numbers on a television
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2024
